mapper.select: select bno, title, writer, regdate, viewcnt from board2 order by bno desc
select bno, title, content, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from board2 where bno=#{bno}
mapper.insert: insert into board2((select nvl(bno, title, content, writer) values (select nvl(max(bno)+1, 1) from board2), #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.update: update board2 set title=${title}, content=${content}, regdate=sysdate where bno=#{bno}
